head.supplied: We the undersigned Fellows of the Linnean Society, London, recommend W. ¶ C. Grasby (Editor of the “Garden & Field” magazine; co-Hon-Secretary, Royal Society, S. Austr.; and Director of the Boy’s Fie...

div.p: To the Linnean Society of London
Linnean Society, London, Certificates of Fellows, Foreign members and associates, 1891-7.

Tate autograph manuscript and signature; other supporters’ individual signatures and dates. We the undersigned Fellows of the Linnean Society, London, recommend W.
Name completed as William in an unknown hand. C. Grasby (Editor of the “Garden & Field” magazine; co-Hon-Secretary, Royal Society, S. Austr.; and Director of the Boy’s Field Club, Adelaide) Headmaster of the Agricultural College, Roseworthy, as a fit and proper person to be a Fellow thereof

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: J. G. O. Tepper (From personal knowledge 5.1.94)

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
12/1/94.
Annotated front bottom: Read 1 March 1894 Ballot. 5 April 1894; front right margin: Compounded 25/7/94 [i.e. paid life membership fee]; back: William C. Grasby 5th April 1894.
See M to O. Tepper, 11 January 1894.
